attributes.action: Waive visa rules for Ukrainians coming to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Russia's invasion of Ukraine has caused massive suffering and forced many people to leave their homes. The UK has a moral duty to support these people and to ensure they are able to seek asylum here. 

Other countries in Europe have already taken similar actions - there is no excuse for the UK not to do likewise.
attributes.background: Normal visa requirements should be temporarily waived to make it easier for Ukrainians fleeing the war to reach the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
